text:
Six months and eight days after weak and feckless then-Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy unilaterally announced he was opening an impeachment inquiry into President Joe Biden in a desperate attempt to save his speakership – which didn’t work anyway and now he’s not even in Congress let alone in charge anymore, lol – the effort faces its all but certain public finale Wednesday as one of the GOP’s witnesses is literally testifying remotely from fucking federal prison.

So much to say but so little words to properly articulate the scale of this failure and the unspeakable incompetence of its chief architect, James Comer and the ease with which Democrats like Jamie Raskin have just abused and tormented him and his allies at every turn.
title: WATCH LIVE: Biden impeachment inquiry series finale
author: Spartan
